name: Edmonton Neighborhood Profile, 2011
description: 2011 Census Statistics by Edmonton neighbourhood from "Abbotsfield" to "York".

distribution.name: 2011 Federal Census by Neighbourhood Alphbetical.xls
distribution.description: This table includes characteristics of people in Edmonton neighborhoods such as population, age, sex, dwellings, families, marital status and language.

distribution.name: CRO0133848_SP.1 (Census 2011).ivt
distribution.description: .ivt file, compatible with Beyond 20/20 This table includes characteristics of people in Edmonton neighborhoods such as population, age, sex, dwellings, families, marital status and language.

distribution.name: CRO0133848_SP.2 (2011 NHS R3).ivt
distribution.description: .ivt file, compatible with Beyond 20/20 This table provides statistical information about people in Edmonton neighborhoods by their demographic, social and economic characteristics as well as provide information about the housing units in which they live.

distribution.name: National Household Survey by Neighbourhood.xls
distribution.description: This table provides statistical information about people in Edmonton neighborhoods by their demographic, social and economic characteristics as well as provide information about the housing units in which they live.
